CTRL

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x0
Size:
0x4
Source:
salida.rdl

Description

Control Register

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[31:17] reserved3 r 0x0 reserved3
[16] CLR w 0x0 CLR
[15:10] reserved2 r 0x0 reserved2
[9:8] OFFSET rw 0x0 OFFSET
[7:3] reserved1 r 0x0 reserved1
[2:0] SIZE rw 0x1 SIZE

Field Descriptions

reserved3 - reserved3

Reserved field

CLR - CLR

Clear the status counter (CNT_DROP) when writing 1.

reserved2 - reserved2

Reserved field

OFFSET - OFFSET

Offset, in bytes, of the aligned data

reserved1 - reserved1

Reserved field

SIZE - SIZE

Size, in bytes, of the aligned data
